title: Do not buy from anything from AUTOSPARZ
selftext:
ALERT ALL INDIANS. 

Hello, if you are looking for car accessories "online", do not buy from autosparz website !

Product dikayenge in stock but you really dont know whether it is in stock or not. 
They may take more than a month to dispatch the product or they may not dispatch at all and if you get frustrated and cancel the order they will never refund the money.

Their whatsapp support is useless infact the customer service is of no use. They do not read mails. They are based out of south india and and I don't want my Indian friends to fall in this TRAP.

Look at the fucking reply.
comments:
I’m also in the same trap. Waiting for weeks for a refund. Guy is a grade A scammer. Every week new excuse and new extension. Honestly have given up now. 3k ka fatka is not going to put me on the streets but a valuable lesson learnt not to deal with shady unknown websites.

https://preview.redd.it/2vuh1nstor4d1.jpeg?width=1290&format=pjpg&auto=webp&s=edb8b90eda96ac517fcce3c41cf30cd2aca1c1d6
